//: Ensure these items are synced accross projects

scripts.coverage: npm run coverage_test && npm run coverage_report
scripts.push: echo Push and release patch to master... && echo ------------------------------ && git push origin master
scripts.release: npm run rules && npm test && npm version patch -m "Patch version %s" && start npm run push
scripts.updateAll: npm run ncu && yarn && npm run commit && npm run release
scripts.sync: git pull && npm run ncu && yarn && npm run commit
